title: Effective Educational Video Design Strategies for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science knowledge and foundational job-related experience
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused training with project-based assessment for current professionals to strengthen social sector competencies

learning_goals: Learners can apply three principles of reducing cognitive load (reducing extraneous processing, managing intrinsic processing, promoting germane processing) when designing instructional videos
Learners can interpret learner preference data through survey-based analysis and incorporate it into video design strategies
Learners can improve learning engagement by at least 20% by designing video content linked to real-world job situations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
